驝字的基本解释

驝
tuó
古同“驼”。

驝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tuō］
同“馲1”。

驝字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　驝； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1446第12
【廣韻】他各切【集韻】闥各切，?音託。【玉篇】驝駝有肉鞍也。行百里，負千斤，而知水行。　又官名。【前漢·百官公卿表】牧驝昆蹏令丞。亦作橐。　又【廣韻】盧各切【韻會】歷各切，?音落。義同。

驝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
驝字的起名意思

暂无。

驝
Basic explanation of words
驝
tuó
The ancient same "camel".
驝
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [tuō]
Same as "Pun 1".
驝
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　婝; Kangxi Strokes: 24; Page Number: Page 1446 Page 12
[Guang Yun] He cuts all [Ji Yun] All cuts, sound support. [Jade articles] The camel also has a meat saddle. Travel a hundred miles, bear a thousand catties, and know the water.　Also official name. [Former Han·Baiguan Gongqing Form] Mu Tu Kun Jian Ling Cheng. Also used as 橐.　[Guang Yun] Lu Geqie [Yunhui] through each cut, the sound falls. The same meaning.
驝
